title: dlc.label_frames(config_path) error
body:
Operating system and DeepLabCut version: deeplabcut 2.0, p3.68, tf1.14 on Linux (ran through a virtual environment using NoMachine) After I extracted my frames, I tried to label them with the following line of code, and got this error. I do have a labeled-data folder, which contains the .png files for each video-- so the extraction was completed successfully. The video titles do not contain spaces, they are named as follows: "FMS1_AcqD1". So I am not sure why I'm getting these messages -- it's even quitting my python environment after it runs.
In [7]: dlc.label_frames(config_path)
